# Add your test case here for debugging and run go test -run=One.
# scatter aggregate using distinct
"select 41 union select 42 union select 2.0 from user"
{
  "QueryType": "SELECT",
  "Original": "select distinct col from user",
  "Instructions": {
    "OperatorType": "Route",
    "Variant": "SelectScatter",
    "Keyspace": {
      "Name": "user",
      "Sharded": true
    },
    "FieldQuery": "select col from user where 1 != 1",
    "Query": "select distinct col from user",
    "Table": "user"
  }
}
